game_description: Your hands are now frogs. Exact your revenge on mosquitoes in a three minute feeding frenzy to achieve the highest score in the swamp. Enter an amphibian zen. Silent your swampy mind. Become the mythical being known as Frog Hands Steve!
review_1: I have an idea try adding skin in the the game Also you should make it a multi player Where you could race people and see who could get the most masquito also you should and boss fights and other insect and arachnids I could help you 3D model
review_3: This game was made in a Game Jam, and it's a totally fun game that gives you exactly what it promises: Frog Hands. Your hands are two frogs which you wield like six shooters, and you use them to catch as many mosquitoes as you can in three minutes. Fire up those tongues, hop-along! It's time to play Frog Hands Steve! Watch my gameplay here: https://youtu.be/QSB2N7OGq00 Thanks for liking, subscribing, and watching StoneToaster Gaming!
review_4: Steve eats the frogs after each round and replaces them with new ones to eat after they get big and chonky. Steve is a monster
review_5: Good frog licking/shooting interaction, it felt sticky and correct. Who is Steve?
